original_text: BT voices its support for IP BTexacts chief technology officer, Mick Reeve, gives his views on the future for voice over DSL services and virtual private networks, and defends the slow rollout of public access WLANs
original_translation: BT expresa su apoyo a IP BTexacts director de tecnología, Mick Reeve, da su opinión sobre el futuro de los servicios de voz sobre DSL y redes privadas virtuales, y defiende el lento despliegue de WLANs de acceso público
